title: Namaste | Nail Sanctuary
description: First-of-its kind relaxation and meditation focused nail salon and spa. Call now to schedule your appointment! Mind.Body.Nails
cleaned_text: Our tranquil look and feel, extra comfortable custom chairs, TVs with serenity streaming, noise cancelling headphones and cell-phone-on-vibrate policy make it easy for you to relax. Manicures and pedicures are performed in a room that is fully enclosed, providing a complete sound barrier and visual separation from our reception areas. Our Sanctuary has just eight chairs, uncommonly far apart, and separated by privacy draping. The result is an environment that's both exclusive and intimate. Each of our chairs have a Deepak Chopra DreamMaster audio-visual system that you're welcome to use, at no additional charge. We take hygenic best practices seriously with hospital-grade autoclaves, single-use files, buffers, and copper pedicure bowls as well as state-of-the-art air extraction systems for a chemical free odorless salon. We carry an array of organic, non-toxic, vegan and cruelty-free products. Featuring brands such as Smith and Cult, Dazzle Dry, Foot Logix, Zoya and Orly. We also carry OPI
